Desc.entry: Family neighbourhood centre hosting a national school for conductive education and a range of inclusive activities for children and families, including STOMP (out of school club), sports, events in the community, LtV project for disabled adults, Steps Community Nursery, COSY (computer recycling project), community caf√©, High Green Development Trust (responsible for managing the Campus) and programmes for adults recovering from strokes. Offers sports through High Green Sports Association. Facilities are open to the local community. Also houses the Coterie Art Galleries and the Hullaballoos Childrens Play centre.

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 35
